{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:34.940

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.600
    | text      = It was just kind of a libertarian, anarcho-capitalist show and discussion group.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.840
    | text      = But it changed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.899

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = refusal to accept criticism, his narcissism, which only seemed to grow as the show got
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:00.919
    | text      = Now I need to tell you about this documentary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:03.700
    | text      = In late 2018, Stefan Molyneux released a documentary called The Hundred Year March, a Philosopher
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.600
    | text      = in Poland, where he ostensibly goes on a fact-finding mission to Poland to experience their country's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.720
    | text      = 100th anniversary parade.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.080
    | text      = What he actually does is something quite different, and that is what we will experience here today.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.919
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:21.919
    | text      = Now, that premise for a documentary seems kind of fun and joyful, and it seems like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:30.320
    | text      = you would go there, and you would see a nation celebrate its hundredth year, and they would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.039
    | text      = all get together, and people would share stories, and it would be a positive way of viewing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:41.600
    | text      = a country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.600
    | text      = You know, sure, we've done a lot of bad shit, we're a nation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:46.279
    | text      = Nations do bad shit, that happens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:48.279
    | text      = But at the end of the day, we're all the same people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.200
    | text      = I'm guessing there's probably a little bit of that that he experienced, but this documentary,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:55.320
    | text      = taken as a whole, is profoundly fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:58.240
    | text      = It is not about going to a march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.039
    | text      = It's about cruel indoctrination and absolutely clear demonstration of a man coming to terms
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.519
    | text      = with being a white nationalist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.720
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:10.720
    | text      = So it's more-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = That's what we're going to experience.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:12.720
    | text      = It's more like the hundredth year anniversary of the Third Reich if the Germans had won.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.440
    | text      = So here's how we start the documentary, where Stefan is walking around in the woods, a snowy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:25.519
    | text      = wood, walking around in the snow, giving out sort of the premise of what he's expecting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:31.240
    | text      = to learn about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:33.680
    | text      = The diversity of Europe, the true diversity of Europe, has always fascinated me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:38.519
    | text      = I have a pan-European family history from Ireland to England to Germany, but my first
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:44.119
    | text      = name is actually Polish.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:45.559
    | text      = It's spelled in the Polish fashion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:47.839
    | text      = And my family history bleeds eastward from Germany across to Poland.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.220
    | text      = And I find Poland incredibly fascinating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:55.819
    | text      = My notebooks are full of so many questions and I feel like I almost can't rest, I can't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.039
    | text      = sleep until I get some answers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:01.880
    | text      = How is Poland able to preserve its culture and its religiosity and its history so passionately
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:09.480

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:48.760
    | text      = indications are that they're actually getting their marching orders directly from him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:52.760
    | text      = If it's not clear why this is a problem, Peter Stasinski, a journalist who published underground
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:58.280
    | text      = periodicals against the Communist Party in the 80s, put it this way, quote, there are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:03.119
    | text      = no longer checks and balances of power.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:05.320
    | text      = The parliamentary system is dysfunctional.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:07.320
    | text      = The Constitutional Court and judiciary are paralyzed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:10.619
    | text      = New laws passed by the parliament can't be challenged or changed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:13.880
    | text      = The government is supposed to publish sentences of the Constitutional Court to the Journal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:17.079
    | text      = of Laws for them to become legally effective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:19.840
    | text      = This is required by the Constitution.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:21.800
    | text      = But the government, by not printing them, paralyzes the Constitutional Court, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:25.400
    | text      = has been reduced to announcing its sentences on the Internet without any legal effect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:29.800
    | text      = It's a very dangerous time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:32.159
    | text      = It's a very dangerous time because in that kind of an environment, evil people are the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:36.360
    | text      = first to realize that there are no longer consequences for their actions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:40.280
    | text      = In this vacuum in Poland, fascists and xenophobic groups have been growing in power at a very
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:44.880
    | text      = rapid pace since 2015, knowing that the state isn't going to be there to push back against
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:49.840
    | text      = the mob.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:51.039
    | text      = This all came to a head at the Independence Day march in 2017, the year before this documentary
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:56.300
    | text      = is shot, which brings us to the reason why there isn't going to be a march this year,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:01.599
    | text      = according to the mayor of Warsaw.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:04.000
    | text      = There's a real reason, but here's what Krzysztof Bosak says.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:07.400
    | text      = What is their excuse, I guess, to cancel the march?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:12.440
    | text      = It's pure nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:14.599
    | text      = There is no reason in Polish law, and we went to the court and the court canceled the cancellation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:22.679
    | text      = of the march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:23.760
    | text      = So we organized the march since nine years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:27.039
    | text      = We organized it always legally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:29.400
    | text      = It's not a far-right march, it's a national conservative march, patriotic march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:35.960
    | text      = Are those different?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:38.079
    | text      = Organized by grassroots right-wing organizations from conservative libertarians, center-right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:43.440
    | text      = people to nationalists, traditional Catholics, monarchists, and so on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:52.320
    | text      = Very different people in one march connected by national pride and patriotism and belief
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:02.360
    | text      = that Polish independence is something very important for us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:06.599
    | text      = So that's a great way to say things, but that's complete bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:10.760
    | text      = So this documentary is literally called Turd Polishing, then?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:13.840
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:14.840
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:15.840
    | text      = So you may remember the videos that came out in 2017 of the independence march in Poland,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:19.199
    | text      = and if you do, you remember seeing a horrifyingly large group of people with some real fucked-up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:23.719
    | text      = signs chanting horrible things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:26.219
    | text      = There were chants of pure Poland, white Poland, and refugees get out that broke out all over
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:31.480
    | text      = the march route.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:32.840
    | text      = One man interviewed by a news station said that he was marching to, quote, remove Jewry
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:36.679
    | text      = from power.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:38.119
    | text      = Tommy Robinson made the trip from the UK specifically to be there for that independence day march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:43.719
    | text      = Andy Eddles, a language teacher in Poland, described the march as, quote, 50 to 100,000
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:48.639
    | text      = mostly football hooligans hijacking patriotism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:52.400
    | text      = People in black masks marched behind large banners that read, Islam equals terror, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:57.440
    | text      = carried signs with slogans like, white Europe of brotherly nations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:00.980
    | text      = Many carried signs displaying the Falanga, the symbol of the National Radical Camp, an
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:05.280
    | text      = ultra-nationalist political party which traces its roots to the Falanga National Radical
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:10.440
    | text      = Camp, a group active in the 1930s who defined themselves by their fascism, antisemitism,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:15.840
    | text      = and eliminationism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:17.420
    | text      = They were a large driving force of antisemitic violence in Poland in the lead-up to World
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:21.119
    | text      = War II.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:22.179
    | text      = Their party was outlawed by the state back then, but now, in 2017, their banner flew
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:26.639
    | text      = freely at this independence day march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:29.260
    | text      = As you might imagine, the optics of this were fucking terrible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:32.159
    | text      = Oh, no, why?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:34.539
    | text      = Politicians marched alongside outright fascists, a celebration of national independence being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:39.480
    | text      = characterized by people with signs demanding a white Europe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:43.000
    | text      = That sort of thing is not good for your look if you're, the politicians are like, I don't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:48.440
    | text      = want to be associated with this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:49.960
    | text      = Whether or not I am okay with it, I don't want to be associated with it, too many of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:54.119
    | text      = these videos are making it into international media.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:56.519
    | text      = Yeah, I don't like, I don't, like when you describe them as football hooligans who are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:03.199
    | text      = also racist, I'm like, oh yeah, we have those in America.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:06.599
    | text      = There's a reason Colin Kaepernick doesn't have a job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:09.480
    | text      = We don't even need to bother with the football equals soccer here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:12.460
    | text      = You just use your word, we use ours, same shit, different day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:16.239
    | text      = So obviously people weren't happy about that march and the optics and the visuals that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:20.340
    | text      = came out of it and people being like, uh-oh, that's really fucking scary, that sort of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:24.400
    | text      = thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:25.400
    | text      = So when the 2018 march rolled around, the mayor of Warsaw said no to the organizers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:29.800
    | text      = like Christoph Bosock, saying, quote, the city has suffered enough from aggressive nationalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:35.400
    | text      = President Duda decided to make his own Independence Day march to replace the one that was banned,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:39.719
    | text      = those being organized by these hyper-nationalist groups.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:42.360
    | text      = That sounds like an adult thing to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:43.639
    | text      = But he specifically said that if anyone was carrying a racist or fascist banner, they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:47.559
    | text      = would be arrested.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:48.559
    | text      = So they canceled the march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:49.559
    | text      = No, they did do the march, but it was a sanitized, whitewashed version of it under threat of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:54.320
    | text      = arrest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:55.320
    | text      = They did that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:56.400
    | text      = The presence of chaotic laws and rampant unconstitutionality taking place since 2015 have created the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:01.480
    | text      = environment in Poland where these sorts of things are bound to happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:04.679
    | text      = We've seen the same thing happen in our country, where fascists and Nazis feel free to walk
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:08.320
    | text      = around in public, unashamed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:10.239
    | text      = This is a large-scale problem in the world, which is why it should come as no surprise
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:13.880
    | text      = that at the 2017 march, fascists also marched with signs that said, we want God, which was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:22.119
    | text      = They weren't quoting the song.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:23.679
    | text      = They were quoting Trump referencing the song in a speech that he gave in Poland a few months
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:28.159
    | text      = prior.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:29.159
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:30.159
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:31.159
    | text      = A defense of the march was published in Politico's European Arm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:46.719
    | text      = So that's a real...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Some would say too many.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So this is...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = 6,000?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = 6,000 is a lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:51.719
    | text      = This guy trying to defend this march and he's starting with 10%?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:55.239
    | text      = That is not a good sign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:56.559
    | text      = I would...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:57.559
    | text      = Look, I was there, 60,000 total people, and only 6,000 people told me that N-words need
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = to go.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:04.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's so nice.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:07.000
    | text      = So that post ends with an argument that this is really about how the EU is desperate to,

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:17.159
    | text      = It's probably worth noting that that defense, that article in Politico, was written by Tomas
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:34.239
    | text      = But yeah, I saw that one coming a long way off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:38.440
    | text      = That was not difficult to guess in advance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:41.199
    | text      = Fingerprints everywhere, everywhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:45.539
    | text      = So that's kind of what's going on with this march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:49.159
    | text      = It got way out of hand in 2017, and the city was like, fuck this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:55.460
    | text      = And then they came up with a sanitized version that was agreeable to everybody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:00.119
    | text      = The nationalists still got to be a part of the march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:03.480
    | text      = The government got to celebrate the 100th anniversary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Everyone got to come out and do this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:08.960
    | text      = And it didn't appear to be something so fucked up like it was the year before.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So Stefan is here, and he's really excited to go to this march.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:56.599

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:02.079

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:18.780
    | text      = And I've never been to Poland before.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:20.159
    | text      = My first name is Polish.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:21.159
    | text      = I know there's family history, but I've never been to Poland before.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:24.840
    | text      = And I can't tell you how strange a feeling it is that I have a sense of unity with people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = in a country I've never been to before.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
